title: Verstappen explains absence from F1 movie preview
summary: Max Verstappen says Formula 1 bosses were aware that he would not attend the preview of the F1 movie on Wednesday, saying he wanted to spend his time at home.â€¦

qa_pairs.question: Which driver was absent from the preview of the F1 movie?
What reason did Max Verstappen give for his absence from the F1 movie preview?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He wanted to spend his time at home.
wrong_options: He was attending a different event.
He was in a training camp.

qa_pairs.question: What role do Formula 1 bosses play in events like movie previews?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They coordinate and manage the participation of drivers and teams.
